itunes:title: One Another Week 1 with Alison Cook
title: One Another Week 1 with Alison Cook
description:
For the first week in our One Another study, Amanda talks with Alison Cook, a psychologist speaker and author who helps women live out their God-given potential. Together, they explore relationships in the body of Christ and the importance of healthy boundaries. Ultimately, we are called to live in community. And, as the Church, it’s our responsibility and privilege to do this in a way that models Jesus. Join us as we reflect on Scripture’s commands to love and care for one another as we seek to live in unity with our fellow brothers and sisters. 


Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 1 of the She Reads Truth One Another reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the One Another collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/one-another-week-1-with-alison-cook
